    • Robot

      public Robot(double bx, double by, double angle)
      Constructs a Robot with specified position and angle.
      参数:
      bx - the x-coordinate of the robot
      by - the y-coordinate of the robot
      angle - the angle of the robot

      Sets the position of the robot.
      参数:
      nx - the new x-coordinate
      ny - the new y-coordinate

      public double getAngle()
      Returns the angle of the robot.
      返回:

    • isHere

      public boolean isHere(double sx, double sy)
      Checks if the robot is at the specified coordinates.
      参数:
      sx - the x-coordinate to check
      sy - the y-coordinate to check
      返回:
      true if the robot is at the specified coordinates, false otherwise

    • tryToMove

      public abstract void tryToMove(RobotArena arena)
      Abstract method for moving the robot in the specified arena.
      参数:
      arena - the arena in which the robot is trying to move

    • showInfo

      public void showInfo()
      Displays information about the robot in an alert dialog.
